utils module¶

Utility functions for network and system operations.

Includes: - get_local_ip: Retrieves the local machine's active IPv4 address by opening

a dummy UDP connection. Falls back to localhost if unable to determine.

utils.py

Utility functions for network and system operations.

Includes: - get_local_ip: Retrieves the local machine's active IPv4 address by opening

a dummy UDP connection. Falls back to localhost if unable to determine.

utils.get_local_ip()¶

Get the local IP address of the current machine.

Attempts to create a UDP socket connection to an unreachable IP address to force the OS to assign the local IP of the active network interface. Returns '127.0.0.1' if this process fails.

Returns:

Local IP address as a string.

Return type:

str
